"It's absurd that Messi finished in 5th place in the Ballon d'Or."

"We are optimistic that Luis Suárez can play against Espanyol."

"Tomorrow will see players that don't regularly play but the goal is always to win."

"The first leg was very tough and we struggled. We want to win tomorrow for our fans."

"We don't know if Sergi Roberto will recover to play before the end of the year. We'll give it time before Christmas, and if he is recovered, fantastic."
